description: The ferris_wiggum app currently has desktop-oriented layouts that don't work well on mobile devices (390px minimum width). Users need full IDE-replacement functionality on their phones, including session creation, PRD editing, git operations, and monitoring running sessions. The current multi-column layouts, fixed-width sidebars, and small touch targets make the app unusable on mobile.

stories.title: Add Mobile Viewport Meta Tag
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the viewport configured correctly So that** the app renders at the proper scale on my device
acceptance_criteria: Add `<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">` to the web app's HTML head

stories.title: Create Mobile CSS Breakpoint Variables
stories.description: As a** developer I want** consistent breakpoint variables defined in CSS So that** all components use the same responsive thresholds
acceptance_criteria: Add CSS custom properties for breakpoints in `main.css`: `--bp-mobile: 480px`, `--bp-tablet: 768px`

stories.title: Make Session Form Single-Column on Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the new session form to stack vertically So that** I can fill out all fields on my 390px screen
acceptance_criteria: Labels have adequate spacing from inputs

stories.title: Make File Picker Sidebar Collapsible on Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the file picker quick-access sidebar to be collapsible So that** I have more room to browse directories
acceptance_criteria: Below 480px, sidebar is hidden by default
Add a toggle button to show/hide shortcuts panel
When visible, sidebar overlays or stacks above the file list

stories.title: Improve File Picker Touch Targets
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** larger touch targets in the file picker So that** I can accurately tap directories and buttons
acceptance_criteria: `.file-picker-entry` has minimum height of 48px on mobile
Navigation buttons (up, home) are at least 44x44px

stories.title: Stack Dashboard Layout on Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the session dashboard to be single-column So that** I can scroll through all panels on my phone
acceptance_criteria: Sidebar panels (Git, Token Meter, Guardrails) stack below main content
All panels remain full-width and functional

stories.title: Create Form-Based PRD Editor for Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** a form-based PRD editor with labeled fields So that** I can easily enter PRD sections without writing raw markdown
acceptance_criteria: Create `PrdFormEditor` component with separate textareas for: Project Name, Description, each User Story (Title, Description, Acceptance Criteria, Priority)
Form generates valid PRD markdown on submit
Each textarea has a clear label

stories.title: Add Story Entry Sub-Form Component
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** each user story to have its own expandable/collapsible form section So that** I can focus on one story at a time
acceptance_criteria: Create `StoryFormEntry` component with collapsible header showing story title/ID
Expanded state shows textareas for: Title, Description (As a/I want/So that), Acceptance Criteria (one per line), Priority dropdown
Stories can be reordered (move up/down buttons)

stories.title: Make PRD Conversation Input Mobile-Friendly
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** a comfortable chat input area So that** I can easily type messages to the PRD agent
acceptance_criteria: `.conversation-input` uses column layout on mobile (textarea above button)
Send button is full-width on mobile
Input area is sticky at bottom of viewport on mobile

stories.title: Optimize Message Bubbles for Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** readable chat messages So that** I can follow the PRD conversation
acceptance_criteria: `.message-bubble` max-width is 100% on mobile (no horizontal scroll)
Font size is at least 16px (prevents iOS zoom on input focus)
Code blocks in messages scroll horizontally within their container

stories.title: Make Session Header Responsive
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** to see session info and controls clearly So that** I can manage my session
acceptance_criteria: Session controls wrap to new line below title
Stats pills wrap naturally and remain readable
Project path truncates with ellipsis if too long

stories.title: Create Mobile-Optimized Git Panel
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** a usable git panel So that** I can manage branches and PRs from my phone
acceptance_criteria: Git panel sections (Branch, PR, Merge) are collapsible accordions
Only one section expanded at a time by default
Buttons have adequate touch targets (44px height minimum)

stories.title: Optimize Token Meter for Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** to quickly see token usage status So that** I know if rotation is needed
acceptance_criteria: Breakdown grid becomes single-column on mobile
Warning/critical alerts are prominent and readable

stories.title: Make Activity Log Scrollable and Touch-Friendly
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** to browse the activity log So that** I can see what the agent is doing
acceptance_criteria: Log entries have adequate height for touch (48px minimum)
Log container has max-height appropriate for mobile viewport
Timestamps are abbreviated on mobile to save space

stories.title: Add Sticky Action Bar for Session Controls
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** Start/Pause/Stop buttons always accessible So that** I can control my session without scrolling
acceptance_criteria: Session controls are in a sticky bar at bottom of viewport on mobile
Buttons are evenly distributed and full-width
Bar doesn't obscure content (adequate padding on last content element)

stories.title: Optimize Story Progress Cards for Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** to see story progress clearly So that** I know which stories are complete
acceptance_criteria: Acceptance criteria list is readable (adequate line height)
Complete/pending status is visually clear with color and icon
Cards have adequate spacing between them

stories.title: Add Mobile Navigation
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** easy navigation between views So that** I can move between session list and active session
acceptance_criteria: Add bottom navigation bar on mobile with: Sessions list, Current session (if any), New session
Icons with labels for each nav item

stories.title: Add Pull-to-Refresh on Session Dashboard
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** to refresh session data with a pull gesture So that** I can update status without finding a refresh button
acceptance_criteria: Works on touch devices only (no conflict with desktop scroll)

stories.title: Optimize Guardrails Panel for Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** to see guardrail violations clearly So that** I can address issues promptly

stories.title: Add Landscape Mode Optimizations
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the app to work well in landscape orientation So that** I can use my phone horizontally for more width
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard can use 2-column layout in landscape if width > 600px
PRD editor textarea has reduced height in landscape to show more of form
Verify in browser in landscape mode
